resume: It's a colourful summer in the 1980s, Luca  and his friends prepare for the dreaded maturità  exams, with all the troubles, emotions, mishaps and delights that typically afflict teenagers at this stressful time. At a party, Luca falls in love with an extroverted yet mysterious girl, Claudia . He only knows her name; because he knows nothing else about her, he has no idea how to find her again. Meanwhile, Luca is desperately trying to get back in favour with his literature teacher , who will be the teacher sitting in on his oral exams.
